__TOC__

This is a list of in-progress or completed ports of '''<nowiki>[[..-|Ubuntu One]]</nowiki>''' to operating systems or Linux distributions that aren't Ubuntu.

Some Ubuntu One features also rely on <nowiki>[[http://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Specifications/desktopcouch|Desktop Couch]]</nowiki>, which also has a <nowiki>[[http://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Specifications/desktopcouch/Documentation/Installing|ports]]</nowiki> page.

=== Gentoo ===

Bertrand Lorentz has ported Ubuntu One to Gentoo at http://bl-log.blogspot.com/2009/12/ubuntu-one-on-gentoo.html.

=== Fedora ===

Thomas van der Stichele has ported Ubuntu One to Fedora at http://thomas.apestaart.org/log/?p=1074.
